permission.grantedDescription: Can find nearby clubs and matches
permission.deniedDescription: Please enable location permission in Settings

alerts.permissionGrantedMessage: Location permission is already granted. You can find nearby clubs and matches.
alerts.permissionMessage: Location permission is needed to find nearby clubs and matches. Please enable it in Settings.
alerts.errorMessage: An error occurred while checking location permission.

update.permissionRequiredMessage: Location permission is needed to get your current location.
update.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating location.

overview.title: Overview
overview.clickAutoInvoice: Click 'Auto Invoice' above to automatically send monthly invoices to all members.

location.changeInSettings: Can be changed in club settings
location.searchHelper: Tap to search for a pickleball court.

message.title: Message (Optional)
message.label: Match Request Message
message.placeholder: Write a greeting or your expectations for the match

validation.minOneSet: At least one set must be entered.
validation.gamesNonNegative: Set {{setNum}}: Games must be 0 or greater.
validation.gamesExceedMaxShort: Set {{setNum}}: In short sets, games cannot exceed {{maxGames}} (max {{gamesPerSet}}-{{minWin}} or {{maxAllowed}}-{{gamesPerSet1}}).
validation.tiebreakRequired: Set {{setNum}}: In {{setType}}, tiebreak points are required when score is {{score}}-{{score}}.
validation.tiebreakMargin: Set {{setNum}}: {{tiebreakType}} must end with a 2-point margin (e.g., 7-5, 8-6, 10-8).
validation.tiebreakMinPoints: Set {{setNum}}: {{tiebreakType}} must reach at least {{minPoints}} points (e.g., {{minPoints}}-{{minPoints2}}, {{minPoints1}}-{{minPoints3}}).
validation.incompleteSet: Set {{setNum}}: In {{setType}}, set ended with less than {{gamesPerSet}} games. Please verify if this was a retirement or special situation.
validation.invalidWinScore: Set {{setNum}}: To win with {{gamesPerSet}} games, opponent can have maximum {{maxOppGames}} games.
validation.invalidWinScoreShort: Set {{setNum}}: In short sets, {{gamesPerSet}}-{{minGames}} is impossible. To win with {{gamesPerSet}} games, opponent can have maximum {{maxOppGames}} games.
validation.invalidMaxGamesScore: Set {{setNum}}: To win with {{maxGames}} games, opponent must have {{gamesPerSet1}} or {{gamesPerSet}} games.
validation.invalidMaxGamesScoreShort: Set {{setNum}}: In short sets, {{maxGames}}-{{minGames}} is impossible. Set ends at {{gamesPerSet}}-{{minGames}}.

validation.singlesNoPartner: Singles tournaments do not require a partner.
validation.mensSinglesMaleOnly: Men's singles is only for male players.
validation.womensSinglesFemaleOnly: Women's singles is only for female players.
validation.mensDoublesMaleOnly: Men's doubles is only for male players.
validation.womensDoublesFemaleOnly: Women's doubles is only for female players.
validation.mixedDoublesRequirement: Mixed doubles requires one male and one female player.
